DSA Progress Tracker
Stay on top of your Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) preparation with the DSA Progress Tracker! Whether you're preparing for technical interviews or sharpening your problem-solving skills, this extension helps you track your progress across various DSA topics in real time.

Key Features:

Topic-Based Tracking: Easily increment or decrement the number of problems solved for each DSA topic with just one click.
Dynamic Topic Management: Add new topics as you explore different areas of DSA. Edit or delete topics as needed.
Real-Time Sorting: Topics with more problems solved are automatically prioritized at the top, giving you a clear view of your strengths.
Total Problem Counter: View the total number of problems solved across all topics at a glance.
Beautiful UI: Experience a modern and attractive design with claymorphism aesthetics, making your progress tracking enjoyable and visually appealing.
Smooth Transitions: Enjoy a seamless and responsive user experience with smooth transitions and interactions.

Coming Soon:

Visual Analytics: Charts and graphs to visualize your progress and identify areas for improvement.
Sync Across Devices: Access your progress and stay updated across multiple devices seamlessly.
Whether you're a beginner or an experienced coder, the DSA Progress Tracker will keep you organized and motivated on your DSA journey. Track your progress, and achieve your coding goals efficiently!
